item.description:
Tune in or log onto www.wwuh.org to hear our very own Carlo Magno. He's is on 91.3 every Saturday from 5-6pm. He along with his brother Tony and Mario Grietti have been hosting this Italian program for close to 25yrs.


"Carosello Musicale Italiano"
Italian educational and cultural program. Special programming mixed with Italian music. Italian music from classical to rock. Longest running non-commercial Italian language radio program in the U.S.A., including weekly sports & news from Italia. Tony is joined each week by co-hosts Carlo Magno (joined 'UH in 1985) and Mario Grietti (Joined 'UH in 1993).
item.name: "Carosello Musicale Italiano"
